source:
TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SEQ_00<tab>The House Manderville artisan stands ready to facilitate your augmentation request.
※Changing classes or jobs will prevent progress during this quest.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SEQ_00<tab>The House Manderville artisan stands ready to facilitate your augmentation request.
※Changing classes or jobs will prevent progress during this quest.

source:
TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SEQ_01<tab>You approach the House Manderville artisan to request the perfection of another Manderville weapon. The ever-enthusiastic craftsman assures you that all is in readiness─except, of course, for the three ample samples of crystallite he bids you prepare.

※You may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

※Chunks of cosmic crystallite can be obtained from Jubrunnah at the aetheryte plaza in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SEQ_01<tab>You approach the House Manderville artisan to request the perfection of another Manderville weapon. The ever-enthusiastic craftsman assures you that all is in readiness─except, of course, for the three ample samples of crystallite he bids you prepare.

※You may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

※Chunks of cosmic crystallite can be obtained from Jubrunnah at the aetheryte plaza in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SEQ_02<tab>With your proffered crystallite in hand, the House Manderville artisan calls upon his High Crucible colleagues to assist with the weaponry's final stage of refinement. The result is “bloody immaculate,” as Gerolt himself puts it, and you are encouraged to return (with more crystallite) should you wish to enhance another Mandervillian masterpiece.
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SEQ_02<tab>With your proffered crystallite in hand, the House Manderville artisan calls upon his High Crucible colleagues to assist with the weaponry's final stage of refinement. The result is “bloody immaculate,” as Gerolt himself puts it, and you are encouraged to return (with more crystallite) should you wish to enhance another Mandervillian masterpiece.

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>Please note that upon completing the quest “Positively Mandervillous,” you will receive a Manderville weapon for <var 08 E4E9450B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94506 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94522 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>Please note that upon completing the quest “Positively Mandervillous,” you will receive a Manderville weapon for <var 08 E4E9450B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94506 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94522 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>Please ensure you have changed to your desired job before speaking with the House Manderville artisan.
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>Please ensure you have changed to your desired job before speaking with the House Manderville artisan.

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_A1_000_003<tab>Undertake this quest as <var 08 E4E9450B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94506 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94522 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_A1_000_003<tab>Undertake this quest as <var 08 E4E9450B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94506 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94522 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>Please speak with the House Manderville artisan again when you are ready to undertake this quest.
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>Please speak with the House Manderville artisan again when you are ready to undertake this quest.

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_006<tab>You have already received <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> and <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8030202 /var>. Please change to a different job and speak with the House Manderville artisan again.
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_006<tab>You have already received <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> and <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8030202 /var>. Please change to a different job and speak with the House Manderville artisan again.

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_007<tab>You have already received <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>. Please change to a different job and speak with the House Manderville artisan again.
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_007<tab>You have already received <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>. Please change to a different job and speak with the House Manderville artisan again.

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>Please ensure that <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> and <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8030202 /var> are either equipped, in your Armoury Chest, or in your inventory.
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>Please ensure that <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> and <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8030202 /var> are either equipped, in your Armoury Chest, or in your inventory.

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_100_008<tab>Upon doing so, you will become eligible to accept the quest “Positively Mandervillous.”
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_100_008<tab>Upon doing so, you will become eligible to accept the quest “Positively Mandervillous.”

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>In order to accept the quest “Positively Mandervillous,” please ensure that <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> is either equipped, in your Armoury Chest, or in your inventory.
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>In order to accept the quest “Positively Mandervillous,” please ensure that <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> is either equipped, in your Armoury Chest, or in your inventory.

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_010<tab>Might I assume you're here to perfect another weapon? Everything is in readiness...except for the incredibly rare and difficult to acquire meteoritic material, of course.
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_010<tab>Might I assume you're here to perfect another weapon? Everything is in readiness...except for the incredibly rare and difficult to acquire meteoritic material, of course.

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_011<tab>If you would be so kind as to provide three ample samples of crystallite, then we can proceed with the augmentation of your chosen armament.
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_011<tab>If you would be so kind as to provide three ample samples of crystallite, then we can proceed with the augmentation of your chosen armament.

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>Chunks of cosmic crystallite can be obtained from Jubrunnah at the aetheryte plaza in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>Chunks of cosmic crystallite can be obtained from Jubrunnah at the aetheryte plaza in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_020<tab>Manage to obtain that crystallite yet? Not to rush you, of course─simply occupying this crafting station gives me a sense of fulfillment like no other, so please, take all the time you need!
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_020<tab>Manage to obtain that crystallite yet? Not to rush you, of course─simply occupying this crafting station gives me a sense of fulfillment like no other, so please, take all the time you need!

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>Chunks of cosmic crystallite can be obtained from Jubrunnah at the aetheryte plaza in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>Chunks of cosmic crystallite can be obtained from Jubrunnah at the aetheryte plaza in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_030<tab>I see you've brought the samples─the subtle glow of crystallite is unmistakable! And is that the weaponry you wish us to enhance...? Ahem. The process will be far less uncomfortable for all involved if you were to remove it first.
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_030<tab>I see you've brought the samples─the subtle glow of crystallite is unmistakable! And is that the weaponry you wish us to enhance...? Ahem. The process will be far less uncomfortable for all involved if you were to remove it first.

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_031<tab>Are we all set to proceed, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>?
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_031<tab>Are we all set to proceed, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>?

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_040<tab>Splendid, splendid. I shall gather our High Crucible dance troupe to extract the essence, then have Master Gerolt elevate your weaponry to the pinnacle of smithing perfection!
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_040<tab>Splendid, splendid. I shall gather our High Crucible dance troupe to extract the essence, then have Master Gerolt elevate your weaponry to the pinnacle of smithing perfection!

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_MANDERVILALCHEMIST_000_042<tab>As before, we shall finalize the oil's composition based upon your stated preferences. The weight given to each martial quality is entirely yours to decide...
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_MANDERVILALCHEMIST_000_042<tab>As before, we shall finalize the oil's composition based upon your stated preferences. The weight given to each martial quality is entirely yours to decide...

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_A2_000_001<tab>Adjust the attributes of your Manderville weaponry.
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_A2_000_001<tab>Adjust the attributes of your Manderville weaponry.

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_043<tab>You can choose three attributes to add to your newly augmented Manderville weaponry. One of these attributes will be set to a lower value than the other two.
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_043<tab>You can choose three attributes to add to your newly augmented Manderville weaponry. One of these attributes will be set to a lower value than the other two.

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_044<tab>Once you have adjusted the values to your liking, select “Confirm” to finalize your decision.
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_044<tab>Once you have adjusted the values to your liking, select “Confirm” to finalize your decision.

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_045<tab>Resetting your weaponry's attributes will require an additional chunk of cosmic crystallite, so consider your choices carefully.
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_SYSTEM_000_045<tab>Resetting your weaponry's attributes will require an additional chunk of cosmic crystallite, so consider your choices carefully.

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_GEROLT_000_047<tab>And done. Bloody immaculate craftsmanship, if I do say so meself...
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_GEROLT_000_047<tab>And done. Bloody immaculate craftsmanship, if I do say so meself...

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_050<tab>Another masterpiece of Manderville weaponry taken to its highest, finest form. The sense of achievement is incomparable!
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_050<tab>Another masterpiece of Manderville weaponry taken to its highest, finest form. The sense of achievement is incomparable!

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_GEROLT_000_051<tab>Aye, especially since the achievement was mostly mine. Well...I s'pose you two have shown <var 1A 02 /var>some<var 1A 01 /var> improvement.
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_GEROLT_000_051<tab>Aye, especially since the achievement was mostly mine. Well...I s'pose you two have shown <var 1A 02 /var>some<var 1A 01 /var> improvement.

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_052<tab>Y-You think so, Master Gerolt? O joyous day!
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_052<tab>Y-You think so, Master Gerolt? O joyous day!

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_GEROLT_000_053<tab>Bloody hells, do ye have to do that now?
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_GEROLT_000_053<tab>Bloody hells, do ye have to do that now?

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_054<tab>While originally conceived to extract crystallite's aetherial energies, the Manderville dance has since come to serve another noble purpose: the unabashed expression of pure elation!
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_054<tab>While originally conceived to extract crystallite's aetherial energies, the Manderville dance has since come to serve another noble purpose: the unabashed expression of pure elation!

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_MANDERVILALCHEMIST_000_055<tab>Join us, Master Gerolt! You know you want to!
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_MANDERVILALCHEMIST_000_055<tab>Join us, Master Gerolt! You know you want to!

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_GEROLT_000_056<tab>Balls to that! Ye can bugger off with yer fancy fop-fashioned fellowship, an' all!
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_GEROLT_000_056<tab>Balls to that! Ye can bugger off with yer fancy fop-fashioned fellowship, an' all!

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_060<tab>Simply marvelous! Another triumph of Mandervillian proportions!
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_060<tab>Simply marvelous! Another triumph of Mandervillian proportions!

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_GEROLT_000_061<tab>Aye, be it ancient arms or alien technology, I'll make 'em all into masterpieces!
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_GEROLT_000_061<tab>Aye, be it ancient arms or alien technology, I'll make 'em all into masterpieces!

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_070<tab>Wield your charges well, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, and do let us know if you've more pieces in your armory you wish to perfect.
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_070<tab>Wield your charges well, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, and do let us know if you've more pieces in your armory you wish to perfect.

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_071<tab>We shall be waiting with open arms...to accept the necessary offering of crystallite, ahaha.
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_CRAFTER04653_000_071<tab>We shall be waiting with open arms...to accept the necessary offering of crystallite, ahaha.

source: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_MANDERVILALCHEMIST_000_072<tab>Likewise, I shall gladly adjust your weaponry's properties should you find their aetherial balance lacking. We are your humble servants!
target: TEXT_CHRHDY451_04807_MANDERVILALCHEMIST_000_072<tab>Likewise, I shall gladly adjust your weaponry's properties should you find their aetherial balance lacking. We are your humble servants!
